scripts.nodefy: for i in $(ls *.capnp.d/*.js); do nodefy --output=node/$(dirname $i) $i; done & cp *.capnp node & wait
scripts.amd: for i in $(ls -d *.capnp.d); do cp -r $i amd; done & cp *.capnp amd & wait
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run compileMySchema && (npm run nodefy & npm run amd & wait)
